name: Sound Soarer
description: Ever wanted to soar around on top of an 3D audio visualizer? Then you will enjoy the maluable playgrounds in different visually stunning universes that the game offers. All governed by music.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1200 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 660 Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Quad Core Memory: 1200 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 770 Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: Any
